message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know will be extremely valuable to your business.  While I can't disclose all the details just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to let you have it for $1,200,000. This is a significant discount, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss the details further.
